item.description:
Web site: barkingcrab.com

Summer's officially over, but we can still squeeze out one last harborside feast before autumn hits! Join us at the Barking Crab, and enjoy a relaxed dining experience with friends among the rustic picnic-table-and-wooden-bench setup. Boston magazine gave it a "Best of Boston" award, deeming their fried clams "exceptional." Ocean breezes abound, so bring a sweater or jacket if you're easily chilled.

If you RSVP "Yes", please be 100% certain you are able to attend: a credit card number was required to hold our reservation. Avoid a NO-SHOW incident by keeping your RSVP accurate...update it as soon as you find you're not able to attend. Please read our "Member Guidelines" below for more information.

~ ADDITIONAL INFO ~

  • Neighborhood: Seaport/Fan Pier district. Landmarks: Moakley Courthouse, Northern Avenue bridge.
  • Menu and Directions: Visit www.barkingcrab.com. Nearest MBTA stops are the Silver Line "Courthouse Station" stop; the Red Line at South Station; or the Blue Line "Aquarium" stop.
  • Parking: Meters on adjacent Seaport Blvd. are free on Sundays. There are also several $12 "All Day" parking lots surrounding the courthouse on Northern Ave.
  • If you're planning on ordering alcoholic beverages, please heed the restaurant's online recommendation to "Bring your ID: We're serious about carding."




The following MEMBER GUIDELINES were developed so our events run smoothly:

Our focus is on friendly and respectful gatherings while
sharing a delicious meal.

Please be considerate of your fellow foodies' time by arriving promptly so that we can be seated together.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.

If this event is full and you wish to attend, please RSVP NO
with a comment to be placed on the wait list.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES afterward and you have not attended, it will count as a NO-SHOW.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within twenty-four hours, without an explanation, it will count as a NO-SHOW.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, to those on the wait list, to the organizer, as well as the restaurant, whose staffing and seating plan are based on the size of our reservation.

If it is less than twenty-four hours from the event and you are not able to attend, you MUST call or text Tonya at (617) 445-7549.

An email from you to Tonya explaining your absence or less than twenty-four hour RSVP change from YES to NO, is an expected courtesy.

If you're removed and have extenuating circumstances, please email Tonya about rejoining.

Your feedback is appreciated, so rate the event by completing the survey afterward.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet outside. If you're late, ask for the Brunch Meetup.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Brunch at The Barking Crab
